thread.title: John Raquette
thread.title_full: American Freight Furniture & Mattress reviewed by John Raquette

author: John Raquette
title: John Raquette
text:
The staff at their Lakeland location are friendly, helpful, and professional. There was, a slight hiccup on delivery date, that was quickly handled, and my furniture was delivered the next day.
The company is great, the staff is GREAT, and the best of the best is, their prices are FANTASTIC I saved over $600 from the next lowest, online, price for the same furniture. :-)
